headline: Arista (ANET) Lifts 2025 Outlook to $8.2B on Hyperscaler Ethernet Demand
summary: We recently published a list of 30 Best AI Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Arista Networks, Inc. headline: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) Appoints Greg Lavender To Board Of Directors
summary: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) has seen a notable price move of 13% over the past week, coinciding with recent changes in its executive ranks and board composition. The appointment of Greg Lavender to its Board of Directors and the forthcoming transition of Chief Platform Officer John McCool to a senior advisory role may have added weight to the company's upward movement, aligning with the broader market's 5% climb. These strategic leadership shifts underline a focus on strengthening technical...
